prerequisite: user does not exist
comment: user does not exist

prerequisite: user has none of the roles in request
comment: None of the roles found with the user

prerequisite: user has caseworker and caseworker-role-two already
comment: Caseworker role not mentioned in the list but it is the last role with the user - deactivate user

prerequisite: user has caseworker, caseworker-role-three and caseworker-role-four already
comment: Caseworker role not mentioned in the list but it is NOT the last role with the user and some caseworker related role present - do not deactivate user

prerequisite: user has caseworker-role-four and some-other-role
comment: Caseworker role not mentioned in the list but it is NOT the last role with the user, but only non-caseworker roles present - do not deactivate user

prerequisite: user does not exist
comment: First/last name mentioned - ignore and log warning

comment: Roles contains judiciary (or other restricted roles?)

comment: Role deletion partially failed for any reason while deleting role by role

comment: Few roles removed and remaining are not found with the user

prerequisite: should user have no role or only caseworker?
comment: Caseworker role mentioned in the list and no role present with the user - deactivate user

prerequisite: User inactive - ignore and log warning
comment: User inactive - ignore and log warning

comment: should remove caseworker role leave payment user should remain active

prerequisite: user exists with or without roles
comment: should remove ALL roles user should be de-actived
